Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that has been meticulously crafted and holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $950000. This is a unique opportunity to secure a piece that could potentially be worth even more in the future, given its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. I believe in the value this product offers and trust it will meet or exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
